SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 42
Theoretical Generality of PROLEG
We make the following assumption to make PROLEG comparable
with LP.
• In the original deﬁnition, loop is not allowed, but here we allow a
loop.
• In the original deﬁnition, we distinguish from facts and rules, but
here we do not distinguish it.
42
speaker: SYSTEM
